post:
Hello,

We have a new promotion for our **Cloud Server Starter+** package.

<h2>Cloud Server Starter+</h2>
- 1024MB RAM
- 1 CPU core
- 30GB SSD storage
- Unlimited Bandwidth (FUP)
- 100Mbit Uplink
- 1 IPv4 address
- 1 /64 IPv6 subnet
- Located in The Netherlands
- Free Anti DDoS option
- Cancel any time

For €2,- per month recurring!

[Order here](https://clients.finalhosting.nl/cart.php?a=add&pid=156&promocode=50%OFF) and use discountcode: **50%OFF**

_Pleace notice IF you are living in the EU and don't have a valid VAT number, you will pay VAT. The percentage depends on the country in which you live._

<hr>

<h2>Updates</h2>
The past weeks, we have add some nice new features to our own build VPS panel.

- Added automatic IPv6 support
- Added IPv6 information in customer panel
- Added live migration feature
- Added scheduled backup option
- Added FiveM pre-installed installation template
- Added local network option

<hr>

<h2>Customer control panel</h2>
We have created a very comprehensive control panel for our customers, listed below are the most important features:

- Uploading your own ISO
- Mount/unmount an ISO
- Change boot order
- Change network adapter
- Create & restore a backup
- VNC
- Reinstall
- Reset password
- Start, stop, reboot
- Create and remove firewall rules for DDoS protected IPv4 addresses.

Your sexy customer control panel:
![](https://i.imgur.com/DakG7nF.png)

<hr>

<h2>Payment methods</h2>
**Local payment options**

- iDeal
- ING Home'pay
- Bankcontact
- Belfius betaalknop
- KBC/CBC
- Pay by phone

**Other payment options**

- Paypal
- Paysafecard
- Mybank
- Przelewy24
- Bitcoin
- SEPA recurring
- SEPA transfer
- Sofort Banking

<hr>

<h2>Business information</h2>
Website: [https://finalhosting.nl](https://finalhosting.nl)
Customer panel: https://clients.finalhosting.nl

KvK number (Dutch business registration): 54033721
VAT number: NL226260471B01

Hope to see you soon!
